comment: Dr. Martin is the best professor I have had in the KSU MBA program.  He could probably teach anything well, but is very passionate about Behavior Management. This is a great course to take in a minimester session. Workload was reasonable and I learned some things that I can actually use in my home and work life.

Dr. Martin is the most interesting and knowledgeable professor I've had in the MBA program at Coles.  Having a course where the instructor is passionate about the subject matter and makes the class time interesting and participative is refreshing.  Dr. Martin gives insights that go well beyond just the business world..  A great minimester course!!

Dr. Martin is one of the most knowledgable and enthusiastic instructors I have had. He is a leading, cutting-edge expert is his field...how habits affect all human behavior (very interesting stuff). Take him, you will be glad you did!
